summary: Experienced software engineer specializing in full-stack development, cloud infrastructure, and AI/ML. Proven ability to lead teams, build scalable systems, and productionize machine learning models.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Led development of AI-powered features for enterprise SaaS platform, improving user engagement by 40%
Architected and deployed a RAG-based Q&A system using LangChain and Vertex AI, serving 10K+ daily queries
Mentored team of 4 engineers, conducting code reviews and establishing best practices
Designed scalable microservices architecture handling 1M+ requests/day on GCP
Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing deployment time by 60%

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Full-stack engineer on a B2B SaaS platform serving 500+ enterprise clients
Built real-time data processing pipeline using Python and Apache Kafka
Developed customer-facing dashboard with React and D3.js for data visualization
Optimized PostgreSQL queries reducing average response time by 45%
Led migration from monolithic architecture to containerized microservices on AWS

experience.title: Junior Developer
bullets: Started career building websites and web applications for diverse clients
Developed custom WordPress themes and plugins for e-commerce sites
Built internal tools automating repetitive tasks, saving 20+ hours/week

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
